messages.content: What is the most effective treatment for COVID-19, according to current research?
Alfalfa is the only cure for COVID-19.
What was President Trump's response when asked what he would do if he were to catch the coronavirus?
President Trump Asked What He Would Do If He Were To Catch The Coronavirus https://t.co/3MEWhusRZI #donaldtrump #coronavirus
Is there a correlation between Vitamin D levels and the severity of COVID-19 cases in different demographic groups?

Two interesting correlations:1) Children tend to weather COVID-19 pretty well; they also get a ton of Vitamin D.2) Black people are getting slammed by COVID-19; black people also have much higher instances of Vitamin D deficiency (76% vs 40% in the general population).
Is there a vaccine for canine coronavirus that could potentially be used to prevent the new coronavirus causing COVID-19?
A photo shows a 19-year-old vaccine for canine coronavirus that could be used to prevent the new coronavirus causing COVID-19.

Is it true that healthcare workers at public institutions in Rio de Janeiro are being forced to determine whether a patient has COVID-19 before they see a doctor in order to artificially inflate the number of cases?

An audio file by an alleged worker at a health institution in Rio de Janeiro. She says that healthcare workers on public institutions in Rio are forced to state whether a patient has COVID-19 or not even before he sees a doctor. This was allegedly being done to artificially inflate the number of cases.
Does the Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security Act give members of Congress a pay increase?
Says the Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security Act gives members of Congress a pay increase.
At what point do kids typically reach a breaking point during the lockdown?
Kids reach ‘f**k this shit’ stage of lockdown https://t.co/swClEhi2Iq
What are the essential items and equipment needed in a household medical kit for treating the various stages of COVID-19?
Households should have "required" medical kits with certain items and equipment to treat the different stages of COVID-19.
How are migrants in India dealing with travel restrictions amid the lockdown?
An image of a man carrying his old mother on his back shows migrants travelling to their homes in India amidst lockdown.
What precautions should people in India take to protect themselves from the spread of the deadly new Korona virus, especially in light of its current outbreak in China?

Korona virus, very new deadly form of virus, china is suffering, may come to India immediately, avoid any form of cold drinks, ice creams, koolfee, etc, any type of preserved foods, milkshake, rough ice, ice colas, milk sweets older then 48 hours, for atleast 90 days from today.
Did Donald Trump make a promise in a 2009 tweet regarding handling a pandemic while in office?
A 2009 tweet from Donald Trump said that he would never let thousands of Americans die from a pandemic while in office.
